sv:property.sv:value: SELECT * FROM hippolog:item WHERE (hippolog:application = 'cms' OR hippolog:application='repository') ORDER BY hippolog:timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM hippostdpubwf:request WHERE NOT hippostdpubwf:type = 'rejected' OR hippostdpubwf:username='__USER__'

/jcr:root/content/documents//*[@jcr:primaryType='hippostdpubwf:request' and @hippostdpubwf:type='publish' and hippostdpubwf:username = '$user'] order by @jcr:score descending
/jcr:root/content/documents//*[@jcr:primaryType='hippostdpubwf:request' and @hippostdpubwf:type='rejected' and hippostdpubwf:username = '$user'] order by @jcr:score descending
